DOC.brief_summary: COPD patient recruit randomly assign one group : 1 ) Control group 2 ) Yoga group . In Yoga group , subject ask participate Modified Dantien Yoga train 12 week ( 3 times/week , 60 min/time ) . The subject evaluate pulmonary function , functional fitness performance , dyspnea score , quality life baseline 12 wk training .
